subject: Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The Sprint Cup points leader Kevin Harvick will start from the pole for Saturday night’s race at Daytona International Speedway after qualifying was rained out.
snippet: The Sprint Cup points leader Kevin Harvick will start from the pole for Saturday night’s race at Daytona International Speedway after qualifying was rained out.
